summary: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me is a feature-length documentary film about the dismal commercial failure, subsequent massive critical acclaim, and enduring legacy of pop music's greatest cult phenomenon, Big Star.
cast: Billy Altman|Jon Auer|Lester Bangs|Chris Bell|David Bell|Norman Blake|The Box Tops|Panther Burns|Cheap Trick|Stephanie Chernikowski|Alex Chilton|Rick Clark|Stephen Ira Cohen|The Cramps|John Dando|Luther Dickinson|Mary Lindsay Dickinson|Steven Drozd|Van Duren|Mitch Easter|Bruce Eaton|William Eggleston|Tav Falco|John Fry|John Hampton|Douglas Hart|Robyn Hitchcock|Andy Hummel|Ross Johnson|Ira Kaplan|Lenny Kaye|John King|Curt Kirkwood|John Lightman|Carole Manning|Mike Mills|The Replacements|Steve Rhea|Will Rigby|Richard Rosebrough|Kliph Scurlock|Tom Sheehan|Chris Stamey|Big Star|Jody Stephens|Sara Stewart|Michael Stipe|Ken Stringfellow|Matthew Sweet|Alexis Taylor|Marge Thrasher|Jon Tiven|Pete Tomlinson|Jaan Uhelszki|Terry Edwards
title: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
